item.title: The database I used
item.description: I used two main database. One is Mysql,anther is Sqlserver. Early, Mysql is the best choice for me. It’s handy and friendly. A financial personal database were builded by it. I downloaded data from CS/BS client and import it into Mysql. Then I wrote many sql-language script to get many statements or reports quickly. It’s saving much of time for me. Now,I use sqlserver to manage huge data because of Mysql support huge data poorly.
